boardgame.description: In Steam you build railroads and deliver goods along an ever changing network of tracks and stations. You build the tracks, upgrade towns, improve your train, and grab the right goods to make the longest, most profitable deliveries. Score your deliveries and add to your income or victory points, balancing your need to invest against your quest to win the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Steam contains a beautiful, double-sided game board. The map on each side depicts terrain, towns, and cities at the start of the railway age. The map of the northeastern USA and neighboring Canada is ideal for 3 or 4 players. Use the map of Europe's lower Rhine and Ruhr region when playing a 4 or 5 player game. You can play Steam on any number of current and future variant and expansion maps, so we include pieces for 6 players._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game plays very similarly to Age of Steam but with modifications to some of its mechanics and artwork. Tracks for income, train level, etc. are all printed on the board around the map such that alternate maps can be overlaid on the board and the necessary tracks will still be able to be used._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Similar to:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Railways of the World_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Mayfair Games (MFG 4551) In Steam, you build railroads and deliver goods along an ever changing network of tracks and stations. You build the tracks, upgrade towns, improve your train, and grab the right goods to make the longest, most profitable deliveries. Score your deliveries and add to your income or victory points, balancing your need to invest against your quest to win the game. Steam contains a beautiful, double-sided game board. The map on each side depicts terrain, towns, and cities at the start of the railway age. The map of the northeastern USA and neighboring Canada is ideal for 3 or 4 players. Use the map of Europe_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s lower Rhine and Ruhr region when playing a 4- or 5-player game. You can play Steam on any number of current and future variant and expansion maps, so we include pieces for 6 players. Steam is the culmination of Martin Wallace_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s classic railroad game series. It contains a brilliantly balanced standard game, and a very rich, elegant basic game. Both offer you unparalleled flavor and fun. Steam * Steel * Wealth Steam Contains: . A full-color, double-sided game board . 130 double-sided track tiles (of 15 types) . 8 _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;New City_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; tiles . 24 wooden player tokens (in 6 colors) . 96 wooden goods cubes (in 5 colors) . 8 _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;New City_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; tiles . 7 _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Action_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; tiles . 18 _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;City Growth_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; markers . 52 gold and silver money tokens . 1 turn marker . 1 cloth goods bag . A simple, full color rules booklet covering both the basic and standard games

Essentially, Martin Wallace_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Totally Renamed Train Game is Steam in a special, limited edition box. Only 350 copies were printed. In common with the first print run of Steam, the box contains nine sets of playing pieces rather than the usual six sets. Condition Notes: While this is a brand new game in shrink wrap, the box was slightly crushed in shipping (from Mayfair), resulting in some dishing on the front and back of the box. There is also a crease on the top side of the box with a small crease extending from the edge of the box into the second L of Wallace on the front of the box. (Please see pictures below.) MSRP on this is $70. We have reduced the price significantly due to the box condition issues. We will ship within the United States by USPS Flat-Rate Priority Mail at actual cost ($10.35), unless you request another method. We can also ship worldwide by USPS Flat-Rate Priority Mail: Canada/Mexico $25.95, all other countries $41.95. If you have another preferred shipping method, just let us know.

Mayfair Games (MFG4551) In Steam you build railroads and deliver goods along an ever changing network of tracks and stations. You build the tracks, upgrade towns, improve your train, and grab the right goods to make the longest, most profitable deliveries. Score your deliveries and add to your income or victory points, balancing your need to invest against your quest to win the game. Steam contains a beautiful, double-sided game board. The map on each side depicts terrain, towns, and cities at the start of the railway age. The map of the northeastern USA and neighboring Canada is ideal for 3 or 4 players. Use the map of Europe_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s lower Rhine and Ruhr region when playing a 4 or 5 player game. You can play Steam on any number of current and future variant and expansion maps, so we include pieces for 6 players. Steam is the culmination of Martin Wallace_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s classic railroad game series. It contains a brilliantly balanced standard game, and a very rich, elegant basic game. Both offer you unparalleled flavor and fun. Steam - Steel - Wealth!
